scripts.install:all: npm run install:admin-api && npm run install:user-api && npm run install:strategy-engine && npm run install:admin-ui && npm run install:user-ui
scripts.build:all: npm run build:admin-api && npm run build:user-api && npm run build:strategy-engine && npm run build:admin-ui && npm run build:user-ui
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:all && npm run start:all
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:admin-api && npm run clean:user-api && npm run clean:strategy-engine && npm run clean:admin-ui && npm run clean:user-ui
scripts.clean:admin-api: cd admin-api && rm -rf node_modules dist package-lock.json yarn.lock
scripts.clean:user-api: cd user-api && rm -rf node_modules dist package-lock.json yarn.lock
scripts.clean:strategy-engine: cd strategy-engine && rm -rf node_modules dist package-lock.json yarn.lock
scripts.clean:admin-ui: cd admin-ui && rm -rf node_modules dist package-lock.json yarn.lock
scripts.clean:user-ui: cd user-ui && rm -rf node_modules dist package-lock.json yarn.lock
